title: Allows for rifle hunting in Wyoming county
summary: Allows for rifle hunting in Wyoming County.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2385

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by Sen. GALLIVAN -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         allowing  the use of rifles for hunting in Wyoming county; and provid-
         ing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Item (i) of paragraph a of subdivision 2 of section 11-0907
    2  of the environmental conservation law, as amended by section 11 of chap-
    3  ter 483 of the laws of 2010, is amended to read as follows:

    4  (i) The counties of       Deer, the first Monday  Pistol, shotgun,
    5    Allegany,               after November 15       crossbow,
    6    Cattaraugus, Chemung,   through first Tuesday   muzzle loading
    7    Chenango, Herkimer,     after December 7        firearm, rifle or
    8    Madison,                                        long bow only
    9    Montgomery, Oneida,
   10    Oswego, Otsego,
   11    Schoharie, Schuyler,
   12    Steuben, Tioga,
   13    WYOMING and Yates
   14    and that portion of
   15    the county of
   16    Broome east of the
   17    Susquehanna river
   18    S  2.  Item  (i) of paragraph a of subdivision 2 of section 11-0907 of
   19  the environmental conservation law, as amended by section 12 of  chapter
   20  483 of the laws of 2010, is amended to read as follows:

   21  (i) The counties of       Deer and bear, the      Pistol, shotgun,
   22    Allegany,               first Monday after      crossbow,

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03422-01-1

       S. 2385                             2

    1    Cattaraugus,            November 15 through     muzzle loading
    2    Chenango, Herkimer,     first Tuesday after     firearm, rifle or
    3    Montgomery, Oneida,     December 7              long bow only
    4    Oswego, Otsego,
    5    Schoharie [and],
    6    Tioga AND WYOMING
    7    and that portion of
    8    the county of
    9    Broome east of the
   10    Susquehanna river
   11    S  3.  This act shall take effect immediately, and shall expire and be
   12  deemed repealed one year after such effective date;  provided  that  the
   13  amendments  to  item  (i)  of  paragraph  a  of subdivision 2 of section
   14  11-0907 of the environmental conservation law made  by  section  one  of
   15  this  act  shall be subject to the expiration and reversion of such item
   16  pursuant to section 13 of chapter 600 of the laws of 1993,  as  amended,
   17  when upon such date the provisions of section two of this act shall take
   18  effect.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to allowing the use of rifles for hunting in Wyoming county; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
